00012 #include "OrthorhombicBoundary.h"  
00013 #include "MonoclinicBoundary.h"

00015 namespace Util
00016 {
00017 
00018    /*
00019    * Serialize an OrthoRegion to/from an archive.
00020    */
00021    template <class Archive>
00022    void OrthoRegion::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00023    {
00024       ar & minima_;
00025       ar & maxima_;
00026       ar & lengths_;
00027       ar & halfLengths_;
00028       ar & volume_;
00029    }
00030 
00031    /*
00032    * Serialize an OrthorhombicBoundary to/from an archive.
00033    */
00034    template <class Archive>
00035    void 
00036    OrthorhombicBoundary::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00037    {
00038       OrthoRegion::serialize(ar, version);
00039       serializeEnum(ar, lattice_, version);
00040       if (Archive::is_loading()) {
00041          reset();
00042          isValid();
00043       }
00044    }
00045 
00046    /*
00047    * Serialize an OrthorhombicBoundary to/from an archive.
00048    */
00049    template <class Archive>
00050    void 
00051    MonoclinicBoundary::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00052    {
00053       ar & l_;
00054       ar & d_;
00055       if (Archive::is_loading()) {
00056          reset();
00057          isValid();
00058       }
00059    }
00060 
00061 }
00062 #endif
